### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5) which is not connected to the power network.

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) with multiple pipe connections.

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) with multiple pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) with pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5) with pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) with pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5) with a single pipe connection.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) with multiple pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5) with multiple pipe connections.

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) with multiple pipe connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5) which is not connected to any pipes.

### Pipe network at fluid system 445732
Consists of multiple pipes connecting various entities, including offshore pumps and boilers.

### Pipe network at fluid system 445755
Consists of multiple pipes, but the fluid system is empty.

### Pipe network at fluid system 445837
Consists of multiple pipes connecting an offshore pump to other entities.

### Pipe network at fluid system 445839
Consists of a single pipe, but the fluid system is empty.

### Pipe network at fluid system 445841
Consists of a single pipe, but the fluid system is empty.

### Electricity network at id 74027
Consists of multiple electric poles, but the voltage is 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe.
- Make sure that the pipe connections are valid and not obstructed by other entities.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when connecting to the power network
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power network through electric poles.

### Errors when using fluid systems
- Ensure that the fluid system is not empty and that the pipes are properly connected to the entities.

### Errors when working with offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to the pipe network and that the fluid system is not empty.
